data.title: Members of the Union of Azerbaijani Writers
data.text:
Overview: Chingiz Akif oğlu Abdullayev (Azerbaijani: Çingiz Abdullayev; born 7 April 1959 in Baku) is an Azerbaijani writer, Secretary of the Union of Azerbaijani Writers.

Date of birth: 7 April 1959

Age: 65

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Writer

Gender: Male

Overview: Aziza Jafarzade (December 29, 1921 in Baku, Azerbaijan – September 4, 2003) (Azerbaijani: Əzizə Cəfərzadə) was an Azerbaijani writer and professor of philology. She was an expert on the history of Aze ...

Date of birth: 1921

Date of death: 2003

Age: 81 (age at death)

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Writer

Gender: Female

Overview: Bakhtiyar Vahabzadeh (Azerbaijani: Bəxtiyar Vahabzadə; Turkish: Bahtiyar Vahapzade; August 16, 1925 – February 13, 2009) was an Azerbaijani poet, dramatist, lyricist and translator as well as a ...

Date of birth: 16 August 1925

Date of death: 13 February 2009

Age: 83 (age at death)

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Poet

Overview: Ahmad Javad (Azerbaijani: Əhməd Məhəmmədəli oğlu Cavad; May 5, 1892 – October 13, 1937) was an Azerbaijani poet. Javad is most remembered for writing the words of the National Anthem of Azerbaijan, which ...

Date of birth: 5 May 1892

Date of death: 13 October 1937

Age: 45 (age at death)

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Poet

Gender: Male

Overview: Eduard Ismaylovich Bagirov (Russian: Эдуард Исмаилович Багиров; 25 October 1975 – 12 April 2023) was a Russian writer, radio presenter, and politician. He was a confidant of Vladimir Putin in the 2012 ...

Date of birth: 25 October 1975

Date of death: 12 April 2023

Age: 47 (age at death)

Nationality: Russian

Occupation: Writer

Gender: Male

Overview: Baba Vaziroglu (full name: Məsimov Baba Vəzir oğlu, born January 10, 1954) is a prosaist, poet, translator, member of Union of Azerbaijani Writers since 1981, laureate of Republic Komsomol award, and an ...

Date of birth: 10 January 1954

Age: 70

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Poet

Overview: Alaviyya Babayeva Hanifa Kizi (12 August 1921 – 23 September 2014) was a prose author, translator of contemporary Russian literature, and publicist.

Date of birth: 12 August 1921

Date of death: 23 September 2014

Age: 93 (age at death)

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Novelist

Gender: Female

Overview: Ali Valiyev (1901–1983) was a prose-writer, the member of Azerbaijan Writers Union, Azerbaijan People's Writer (June 9, 1974), the State reward prize-winner named after M.F. Akhundov.

Date of birth: 1901

Date of death: 1983

Age: 81 (age at death)

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Writer

Overview: Aida Nasir gizi Imanguliyeva was born on October 10, 1939, in Baku in a highly educated family. Her father, a well-known journalist, pedagogue, Honoured Worker of Science—Nasir Imanguliyev was one of the ...

Date of birth: 10 October 1939

Date of death: 19 September 1992

Age: 52 (age at death)

Occupation: Writer

Gender: Female

Overview: Hidayat Khudush oglu Orujov (Azerbaijani: Hidayət Orucov Xuduş oğlu; born September 5, 1944) is a notable writer and an Azerbaijani politician became the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious ...

Date of birth: 5 September 1944

Age: 79

Nationality: Azerbaijani

Occupation: Educator

Overview: Hikmat Ziya oghlu Afandiyev (Azerbaijani: Hikmət Ziya oğlu Əfəndiyev, May 13, 1929 — August 2, 1995) was an Azerbaijani poet, translator, and children's writer. He was a member of the Union of Azerbaijani ...

Date of birth: 13 May 1929

Date of death: 2 August 1995

Age: 66 (age at death)
